name: Alec Bradley - Raices Cubanas - Churchill
additionalNotes: Alec Bradley Raices Cubanas is named for the famed factory in Danli, Honduras where most of the Alec Bradley brands are created. This medium to full-bodied blend is composed of juicy Honduran & Nicaraguan binders and fillers which is then clothed in a light-brown Honduran wrapper. This arrangement of tobaccos unleashes enjoyable flavors of pepper, spice and cedar.
